main event: A UFO sighting reported in Lebanon, Ohio on March 17, 1967.
interesting points: The witness reported seeing a bright round light that appeared to dip downwards and then straight up again., The report indicates the sky conditions were cloudy at the time of the sighting., The sighting was observed around 9:25 A.M., The witness indicated he was located half a mile south of Lebanon, Ohio., The witness's wife was present during the sighting.
witness description: male, age 37, reported sighting with wife
